title: Finding Outliers
text: In order to determine which is the better measure of the data, let's consider if there are outliers. Note that if there are, the median may be a better measure of the \"center\" of the data as the median is less pulled by outliers to skew than the mean is.

title: Determining the Overall Better Measure
text: Now, knowing that there is an outlier, based on the previous hints given, is the median a better measure of the \"center\" (or middle of the data) or the mean?
